alert.note: Alert for Coastal Horry (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wilmington (Northeastern South Carolina and Southeastern North Carolina - Wilmington)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 07 at 4:44PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of south central Horry County through 530 PM EDT... At 444 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Myrtle Beach Airport. This storm was nearly stationary. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Myrtle Beach, Surfside Beach, Myrtle Beach Airport, Springmaid Pier, Socastee, Garden City, Forestbrook and Burgess. This includes SC Highway 31 between mile markers 5 and 7. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
